Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides a tax credit for the cost of fishing and hunting licenses issued to volunteer firefighters and ambulance workers
Summary: Provides a tax credit for the cost of fishing and hunting licenses issued to volunteer firefighters and ambulance workers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to a credit for hunting and fishing license fees for volunteer firefighters and volunteer ambulance workers
